titleStmt.title: Londoners their entertainment in the countrie. Or the whipping of runnawayes Wherein is described, Londons miserie. The countries crueltie. And mans inhumanitie.
titleStmt.author: Petowe, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H[umphrey] L[ownes] for C[utbert] B[urby],

notesStmt.note: Includes "Londons welcome home to her citizens", in verse.
Printer's and publisher's names from STC.

Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
